Strings.String: Administrator permissions are required to install .NET Core 3.1 Desktop Runtime (v3.1.3). Contact your administrator.
Installation of the .NET Core 3.1 Desktop Runtime (v3.1.3) is not supported on this operating system. Contact your application vendor.
This version of the .NET Core 3.1 Desktop Runtime (v3.1.3) is not supported on an IA-64 operating system. Contact your application vendor.
A failure occurred attempting to install the .NET Core 3.1 Desktop Runtime (v3.1.3).
